The following terms apply to Contributors who purchase Registry Gift Cards from a honeymoon registry on Luxury Link, and to the Registrant who redeems the Registry Gift Cards. By purchasing or redeeming a Registry Gift Card, you also agree to be bound by the Company’s Terms of Use, available at http://www.luxurylink.com/about/index.php/terms-of-use. Capitalized terms are defined in the Terms of Use.

(i) Purchase Terms. Each Contributor will be charged at the time the Contributor purchases the Registry Gift Card for the Registrant. Once a Registry Gift Card is purchased, it may not be returned for a refund. Registry Gift Cards are not physical plastic cards; they are electronic gift cards with a unique number.

(ii) No Fees or Expiration Dates. There are no fees to purchase or redeem Registry Gift Cards. Registry Gift Cards do not expire.

(iii) Redemption. Registry Gift Cards must be redeemed toward the purchase of eligible products on Luxury Link. Purchases are deducted from the Registry Gift Card balance until the balance reaches zero. If an order exceeds the amount of the Registry Gift Card, the balance must be paid with a another Registry Gift Card, a credit card, or other authorized payment method. Company may provide Contributors with information about the redemption status Registry Gift Cards that they contribute to. To view Registry Gift Card balances, follow the instructions on the Site. Company may, in its sole discretion, permit Registrants to redeem Registry Gift Card balances in cash (currency or check) for its cash value, or replace it with a new Registry Gift Card at no cost to the Registrant. Registry Gift Card balances are redeemable for cash (currency or check) when the balance is less than $10 (or a higher amount if permitted by the Company) or as otherwise required by law. If you return any item purchased with a Registry Gift Card, any refund will be issued to your Registry Gift Card.

(iv) Limitations. Registry Gift Cards cannot be used to purchase other gift cards (but may be consolidated into a single Registry Gift Card). Registry Gift Cards cannot be reloaded, resold, transferred for value, redeemed for cash (except as described above) or applied to any other account, except to the extent required by law.

(v) Risk of Loss. Ownership and risk of loss of Registry Gift Cards passes to the Registrant as soon as Company sends a confirmation receipt to the Registrant. We are not responsible for lost or stolen Registry Gift Cards. Registrant is responsible for all transactions associates with the Registry Gift Card, including unauthorized transactions.
